programme.title: The Glory of Global Chinese
programme.desc: The University of Chicago integrates art into education, daily life, community engagement, and cultural preservation through its world-class resources, while actively engaging outstanding students in art appreciation and analysis.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: A hard drive containing a client for the Three-Body game is found in the main control room of the dismantled Judgment Day. In the game, Listener No. 1379 recounts the the first time he received the message from Hong An introducing Earth.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: Shi Qiang and Wang Miao continue the game and learn that the Three-Body Listening Station, like the Red Bank Base on Earth, monitors information from space. The Trisolaren announces that a fleet is heading towards Earth.

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: Lin Li, a creative director at a beauty company, is a strong-willed career woman with a vulnerable side. One day, her boss unexpectedly decides to engage a young Internet celebrity to compete with her. Lin Li is then dealt with another blow when she discovers that her husband Chen Shi is having an extramarital affair.

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: Lin Li's daughter Si Yuan finds out that her father is having an affair with tutor Yu Ting. Unable to forgive her father, Si Yuan wrecks Yu Ting's laptop. Lin Li presses Chen Shi about his affair and he insists that their marriage has long had problems. Lin Li goes to the playground where Dong Sheng recognises her as the big sister who helped him when he was a kid.

programme.title: Longxing Northern Expedition
programme.desc: During the Song Dynasty, in a desperate situation spanning 800 miles, a young hero and his companions join forces with General Li Xianzhong to launch a prosperous northern expedition, reclaiming lost territories.

programme.title: American Moments
programme.desc: First Robotics Competition is a significant championship that encourages middle school students to learn and practice the techniques of robot development. It also offers the participants an excellent advantage for college admissions.

programme.title: Boiling Pot
programme.desc: Invited by Taiwanese immigrant couple Ming and Michelle Hsu, Noelle gets to hear their memories of Taiwanese Bento Box while tasting classic Taiwanese street food.

programme.title: Tale of Phantom: A Love Story
programme.desc: On the way back from his studies, the scholar runs into a female spirit. Falling in love, they bravely enter the realm of trust and join hands to fight against an entire spiritual clan. Defying death, they stage a poignant story of inter-clan romance.

programme.title: Explore China Shorts
programme.desc: Learn how to make Tianjin style pancakes and Guobulin buns, also known as Go Believe buns.

programme.title: The Glory of Global Chinese
programme.desc: The University of Chicago integrates art into education, daily life, community engagement, and cultural preservation through its world-class resources, while actively engaging outstanding students in art appreciation and analysis.

programme.title: Explore China Shorts
programme.desc: Visit the Binhai Library and the Porcelain House, a house made entirely of broken pieces of china.

programme.title: The Rebel Princess
programme.desc: Si Jin Er reveals she is Xie Wan Ru's spy under the intimidation of Hu Ye Qi.

programme.title: The Rebel Princess
programme.desc: He Ye Qi is confused by He Lan Jian cooperatimg with both Xie Wan Ru and Zi Dan at the same time.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne
programme.desc: Chi-bun puts pressure on Ho-yee. He implies the casino project is going ahead.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne
programme.desc: Ho-yee buys Ko Tsun a meal. Chi-lam pretends to get into trouble as she coaxes Ko Tsun into saving her.

programme.title: Love Endures
programme.desc: Huang Ying Zi is a journalist for a local online news media outlet in Jiangzhou. During an interview, she offends a prominent business figure leading to a reprimand from the editor.

programme.title: Love Endures
programme.desc: Huang Ying Zi is disappointed that the Gang of Six is no longer close. She calls for Jiang Yi, Fang Ming Yu, and Zhuang Yuan to wrap dumplings at her house on the pretext of welcoming Jiang Yi back.

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: Si Yuan runs away from home, seeking refuge at fellow netizen Dong Sheng's friend's home. Chen Shi and Lin Li go to places frequented by Si Yuan but canít find her. Chen Shi recalls that Si Yuan actively participates in a group that investigates the paranormal and thinks she may be with them. Lin Li is furious that Chen Shi secretly allowed Si Yuan to make friends online.

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: Chen Shi recalls the promises he made to Lin Li when he proposed to her and decides to break up with Yu Ting but when he sees her vulnerable side, he can't bear to continue. Chen Shi plans to broach the subject of divorce to Lin Li but she tells him that she wants to salvage their marriage; Chen Shi is caught in a dilemma.

programme.title: Tale of Phantom: A Love Story
programme.desc: On the way back from his studies, the scholar runs into a female spirit. Falling in love, they bravely enter the realm of trust and join hands to fight against an entire spiritual clan. Defying death, they stage a poignant story of inter-clan romance.

programme.title: American Moments
programme.desc: Sean Park, owner and chef of a Tsukeman resutaurant at LA's Chinatown shares his experience making the special and niche Japanese noodles.

programme.title: Boiling Pot
programme.desc: Roast Duck is a traditional palace dish. Noelle has a challenge to slice the roast duck in as many slices as possible. Will she debunk the secret recipe too?
